p: S. baicalensis Georgi samples were collected from the medical plant garden at Heilongjiang University of Chinese Medicine. In October 2018, 2-year-old plants of S. baicalensis were sprayed with aqueous Na 2S 2O 4 aqueous solutions with concentrations of 40 μmol/L, 0.4 μmol/L, and 0.004 μmol/L, and the control group was kept moist with just water. The samples were collected 0, 1, 2, and 3 days after spraying. A total of 5 plants were selected for each sample, the dirt was washed off, the xylem was removed, and the samples were freeze-dried and then ground into a fine powder.
